member.name: T:NetTopologySuite.IO.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.Properties.Resources.UnexpectedEndOfStream
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The GEOGRAPHY structure received is incomplete and cannot be read..

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.Properties.Resources.UnexpectedGeographyType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unsupported type: {0}.

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.Properties.Resources.UnexpectedGeographyVersion
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Version {0} of the GEOGRAPHY structure received. This version isn't supported..

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.Properties.Resources.UnexpectedGeometryType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unsupported Geometry implementation: {0}.

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.Properties.Resources.UnexpectedOgcGeometryType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unsupported type: {0}.

member.name: T:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialReader
member.summary: Reads geography or geometry data in the SQL Server serialization format (described in MS-SSCLRT) into instances.

member.name: M:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialReader.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialReader.#ctor(GeoAPI.IGeometryServices)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The geometry services used to create instances.

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialReader.RepairRings
member.summary: Gets or sets whether invalid linear rings should be fixed. Returns false since invalid rings are disallowed. Setting does nothing.

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialReader.HandleSRID
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the SpatialReference ID must be handled. Returns true since it's always handled. Setting does nothing.

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialReader.AllowedOrdinates
member.summary: Gets and flag that indicate which ordinates can be handled.

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialReader.HandleOrdinates
member.summary: Gets and sets flag that indicate which ordinates shall be handled.
member.remarks: No matter which flag you supply, are always processed, the rest is binary and 'ed with .

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialReader.IsGeography
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to read geography data. If not, geometry data will be read.

member.name: M:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialReader.Read(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Reads a geometry representation from a to a Geometry.
member.param: The source to read the geometry from

member.name: M:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialReader.Read(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Reads a geometry representation from a to a Geometry.

member.name: T:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialWriter
member.summary: Writes instances into geography or geometry data in the SQL Server serialization format (described in MS-SSCLRT).

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialWriter.ByteOrder
member.summary: Gets or sets the desired . Returns since it's required. Setting does nothing.

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialWriter.HandleSRID
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the SpatialReference ID must be handled. Returns true since it's required. Setting does nothing.

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialWriter.AllowedOrdinates
member.summary: Gets and flag that indicate which ordinates can be handled.

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialWriter.HandleOrdinates
member.summary: Gets and sets flag that indicate which ordinates shall be handled.
member.remarks: No matter which flag you supply, are always processed, the rest is binary and 'ed with .

member.name: P:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialWriter.IsGeography
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to write geography data. If not, geometry data will be written.

member.name: M:NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerSpatialWriter.Write(GeoAPI.Geometries.IGeometry)
member.summary: Writes a binary representation of a given geometry.

member.summary: Writes a binary representation of a given geometry.
